entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 8:45 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:45 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 2.
